creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: dramatically arched dragon body emerging from swirling black mist, face at LLC; three sharp claws are visible, the claw at LLC is clutching a golden spiral; dragon is flanked by lightning bolts; swirling cloud pattern with pink, green, and blue shading circles and frames the dragon
signed: signed LRQ; date, LRQ:  [ 大正八年吉祥月日・天祿宗完 ] (An auspicious date, 1919)
title: Dragon
